tip_enable: After enabling, trigger message type to reply with specified content
msg_select_date_range: Please select start and end date
msg_select_at_least_one_week: Please select at least one day
tip_cross_day: If you need to span across days, please add another time reply separately: the first ends at 23:59, the second starts from 0:00
tip_priority: Smaller numbers indicate higher priority. Priority is only effective when time conflicts occur. For example, if one rule is set for 1-9 AM and another for 3-10 AM, when triggered at 8 AM, only the rule with the highest priority will be triggered.
tip_reply_interval: seconds. The reply will only be triggered once within the time interval. 0 seconds means no time interval limit
msg_max_reply_content: Maximum 5 reply contents can be added
msg_at_least_one_reply: Please add at least one reply content
msg_priority_range: Priority must be an integer between 1-100
msg_select_message_type: Please select at least one specified message type
msg_load_failed: Failed to load rule, please try again later
